Bio

I am a M.Sc. student in the department of Electrical Engineering and Information Technology at ETH Zürich. My research interests lie in computer vision and machine learning. I am particularly interested in unsupervised/semi-supervised learning, life-long learning and learning with scarce data.

Before coming to ETH Zürich, I completed my Bachelor's degree from NITK Surathkal. During this time, I interned at INRIA under Francois Bremond and at IACV, Indian Institute of Science under Soma Biswas working on action recognition and zero-shot learning.
